column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Our most expensive ramen is the Cha Cha Cha at $13.95. Our closest competitor (in comparison to design buildout cost and location/rent structure) charges $14 for their basic chicken ramen. And their most expensive pork ramen is $20. We sell five pieces of our crispy chicken tapas dish for $4.99
column2: while our competitor sells five pieces for $11.
